long_description: The Channel Craft Audubon bird call when twisted produces sounds which attract a variety of wild songbirds. Simple birchwood/metal instrument is compact and lightweight, fitting easily into a pocket. The Channel Craft Audubon bird call comes with powdered rosin which should be applied occasionally to renew the call's voice.
short_description: The Channel Craft Audubon bird call when twisted produces sounds which attract a variety of wild songbirds.
